originalTitle: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
title: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
content: The opposition politician is accused of election violence in which at least seven people were killed.

originalTitle: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
title: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
content: The internet was shut during the general election, leaving many people without any income - or entertainment.

originalTitle: Guinea-Bissau coup leaders set December election date
title: Guinea-Bissau coup leaders set December election date
content: Regional powers Ecowas had previously warned junta head Horta N'Tam against such a long wait for elections.

originalTitle: Son-in-law of opposition figure Edmundo Gonzalez released in Venezuela
title: Son-in-law of opposition figure Edmundo Gonzalez released in Venezuela
content: Rafael Tudares Bracho, who is married to Gonzalez's daughter, was arrested shortly before Maduro's third inauguration.

originalTitle: Two popular Tunisian journalists handed three-year jail terms
title: Two popular Tunisian journalists handed three-year jail terms
content: Press rights campaigners slammed the case against Bohran Bssaies and Mourad Zghidi as "legal persecution".

originalTitle: Is the world’s rules-based order ruptured?
title: Is the world’s rules-based order ruptured?
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney says system is broken, with world powers employing force.

originalTitle: 'It's all about the land': Zelensky says Ukraine to talk to US and Russia
title: 'It's all about the land': Zelensky says Ukraine to talk to US and Russia
content: The meeting came as US envoy Steve Witkoff headed to Moscow for a meeting with Russia's Vladimir Putin.

originalTitle: US unveils plans for 'New Gaza' with skyscrapers
title: US unveils plans for 'New Gaza' with skyscrapers
content: "We're going to be very successful in Gaza," President Trump says, as his administration laid out its vision for post-war reconstruction.

originalTitle: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
title: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
content: The vessel, named Grinch, was stopped by the French navy as it travelled through waters between Spain and Morocco.

originalTitle: Midfielder Casemiro to leave Man Utd this summer
title: Midfielder Casemiro to leave Man Utd this summer
content: Manchester United say midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of this season.

originalTitle: Infantino joke about British fans was 'cheap' - FSA
title: Infantino joke about British fans was 'cheap' - FSA
content: The Football Supporters' Association criticises Fifa president Gianni Infantino for making a "cheap" joke about British fans' behaviour at World Cups.

originalTitle: Salah prime target for Saudi Pro League - Friday's gossip
title: Salah prime target for Saudi Pro League - Friday's gossip
content: Mohamed Salah and Vinicius Jr are prime targets for Saudi Pro League, Crystal Palace hold talks with Wolves over move for Jorgen Strand Larsen, Chelsea consider loan deal for Douglas Luiz, plus more.
